mapper.select: select rule_set_id ,file_id ,column_name ,column_idx ,column_data_list ,column_unit ,example ,error_msg ,fixed_msg ,column_type ,null_yn ,diagnosis_yn ,pattern_yn ,date_pattern ,code_pattern ,string_pattern from rule_set where file_id = #{fileId} order by column_idx
mapper.insert: insert into fixed_history ( id, history_id, file_id, rule_set_id, row_num, origin, fixed, fixed_msg, error_msg, fixed_yn ) values ( #{id}, #{historyId}, #{fileId}, #{ruleSetId}, #{rowNum}, #{origin}, #{fixed}, #{fixedMsg}, #{errorMsg}, #{fixedYn} )

insert into diagnosis_result ( id, history_id, file_id, dup_del_yn, col1,col2,col3,col4,col5,col6,col7,col8,col9, col10,col11,col12,col13,col14,col15,col16,col17,col18,col19, col20,col21,col22,col23,col24,col25,col26,col27,col28,col29, col30,col31,col32,col33,col34,col35,col36,col37,col38,col39, col40,col41,col42,col43,col44,col45,col46,col47,col48,col49, col50,col51,col52,col53,col54,col55,col56,col57,col58,col59, col60,col61,col62,col63,col64,col65,col66,col67,col68,col69, col70,col71,col72,col73,col74,col75,col76,col77,col78,col79, col80,col81,col82,col83,col84,col85,col86,col87,col88,col89, col90,col91,col92,col93,col94,col95,col96,col97,col98,col99,col100 ) values ( #{id}, #{historyId}, #{fileId}, #{dupDelYn}, #{col1},#{col2},#{col3},#{col4},#{col5},#{col6},#{col7},#{col8},#{col9}, #{col10},#{col11},#{col12},#{col13},#{col14},#{col15},#{col16},#{col17},#{col18},#{col19}, #{col20},#{col21},#{col22},#{col23},#{col24},#{col25},#{col26},#{col27},#{col28},#{col29}, #{col30},#{col31},#{col32},#{col33},#{col34},#{col35},#{col36},#{col37},#{col38},#{col39}, #{col40},#{col41},#{col42},#{col43},#{col44},#{col45},#{col46},#{col47},#{col48},#{col49}, #{col50},#{col51},#{col52},#{col53},#{col54},#{col55},#{col56},#{col57},#{col58},#{col59}, #{col60},#{col61},#{col62},#{col63},#{col64},#{col65},#{col66},#{col67},#{col68},#{col69}, #{col70},#{col71},#{col72},#{col73},#{col74},#{col75},#{col76},#{col77},#{col78},#{col79}, #{col80},#{col81},#{col82},#{col83},#{col84},#{col85},#{col86},#{col87},#{col88},#{col89}, #{col90},#{col91},#{col92},#{col93},#{col94},#{col95},#{col96},#{col97},#{col98},#{col99}, #{col100} )

insert into diagnosis_history ( history_id, file_id, col1,col2,col3,col4,col5,col6,col7,col8,col9, col10,col11,col12,col13,col14,col15,col16,col17,col18,col19, col20,col21,col22,col23,col24,col25,col26,col27,col28,col29, col30,col31,col32,col33,col34,col35,col36,col37,col38,col39, col40,col41,col42,col43,col44,col45,col46,col47,col48,col49, col50,col51,col52,col53,col54,col55,col56,col57,col58,col59, col60,col61,col62,col63,col64,col65,col66,col67,col68,col69, col70,col71,col72,col73,col74,col75,col76,col77,col78,col79, col80,col81,col82,col83,col84,col85,col86,col87,col88,col89, col90,col91,col92,col93,col94,col95,col96,col97,col98,col99,col100 ) values ( #{historyId}, #{fileId}, #{col1},#{col2},#{col3},#{col4},#{col5},#{col6},#{col7},#{col8},#{col9}, #{col10},#{col11},#{col12},#{col13},#{col14},#{col15},#{col16},#{col17},#{col18},#{col19}, #{col20},#{col21},#{col22},#{col23},#{col24},#{col25},#{col26},#{col27},#{col28},#{col29}, #{col30},#{col31},#{col32},#{col33},#{col34},#{col35},#{col36},#{col37},#{col38},#{col39}, #{col40},#{col41},#{col42},#{col43},#{col44},#{col45},#{col46},#{col47},#{col48},#{col49}, #{col50},#{col51},#{col52},#{col53},#{col54},#{col55},#{col56},#{col57},#{col58},#{col59}, #{col60},#{col61},#{col62},#{col63},#{col64},#{col65},#{col66},#{col67},#{col68},#{col69}, #{col70},#{col71},#{col72},#{col73},#{col74},#{col75},#{col76},#{col77},#{col78},#{col79}, #{col80},#{col81},#{col82},#{col83},#{col84},#{col85},#{col86},#{col87},#{col88},#{col89}, #{col90},#{col91},#{col92},#{col93},#{col94},#{col95},#{col96},#{col97},#{col98},#{col99}, #{col100} )
mapper.select: select history_id, file_id, file_name from file_history where history_id = #{historyId} and file_id = #{fileId}
select code_id, code_name, code_value from comm_code where code_id = #{codeId}
mapper.insert: insert into rule_set ( file_id, column_name, column_idx, column_data_list, column_unit, example, column_type, null_yn, diagnosis_yn, pattern_yn, date_pattern, code_pattern, string_pattern, created_at, updated_at ) values ( #{fileId}, #{columnName}, #{columnIdx}, #{columnDataList}, #{columnUnit}, #{example}, #{columnType}, #{nullYn}, #{diagnosisYn}, #{patternYn}, #{datePattern}, #{codePattern}, #{stringPattern}, datetime('now'), datetime('now') )
mapper.select: SELECT B.file_name AS dataSet /*데이터셋*/ ,A.FILE_NAME AS fileNm /*파일명*/ ,A.FILE_TYPE AS fileType /*파일타입*/ ,A.STATUS AS proStat /*처리현황*/ ,A.ERROR_YN AS errYn /*오류여부*/ ,A.FIXED_FILE AS fixedFile /*정비파일*/ ,A.HISTORY_ID AS historyId FROM file_history A INNER JOIN files B ON A.file_id =B.file_id WHERE A.history_id = #{historyId}
mapper.insert: insert into files ( file_id, file_name, column_count, seq, offer_organ_name, created_at, updated_at ) values ( #{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{columnCount}, #{seq}, #{offerOrganName}, datetime('now'), datetime('now') )
